Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The process includes mandatory setups, loops for configuration attempts, exclusive choices for deployment methods, and concurrent tasks.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: SRV must occur before CS, and CS is a prerequisite for DA and ACI, which are parallel.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: After DA and ACI, a loop starts for BNC and D&R, which repeats until stable.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Deployment involves an exclusive choice between CD and MD.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: QA and SA are independent but must occur after deployment and before GLA.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: Consider SRV as implicit or explicitly modeled. The reasoning trace debated whether SRV should be included as a node or assumed as part of the process.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Checked that the order constraints align with the process logic: e.g., CS -> DA/ACI, DA/ACI -> Loop, Loop -> XOR (CD/MD), XOR -> QA/SA, QA/SA -> GLA.

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Resolved the structure of the loop node to ensure it aligns with the definition of BNC followed by optional D&R, repeating until stable.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: QA and SA are in a partial order, with no edge between them but both leading to GLA.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Ensured all transitions, operators, and partial orders were appropriately structured and linked in the code.
